items.name: Defiance of Destiny
explicitMods: Gain 41% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy
flavourText: The farmer was struck again and again, but he refused to stay down.
Astonished, the raiding warlord ordered the man's family spared.

items.name: Bramble Skewer
implicitMods: Trigger Level 30 Flame Dash when you use a Socketed Skill
40% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills
explicitMods: Adds 42 to 88 Fire Damage to Spells
92% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+1 to Level of all Spell Skill Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that multiplies damage over time and increases skill effect duration of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 20% more Damage over Time
You and nearby allies have 19% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 25% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 18% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Fire Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Ignite
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage. If you hit an ignited enemy, will create burning ground under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.
explicitMods: 113% more Damage with Hits against Burning enemies
Hits on Ignited Enemies create Burning Ground, no more than once every 2 seconds
Burning Ground deals 25% of Fire Damage per second of Ignite affecting Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.
explicitMods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
Supported Skills have 26% reduced Curse Duration
Hexes applied by Supported Curse Skills have 18% chance to affect Hexproof Enemies
+1 to Level of Supported Curse Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.
